title: Who's the best tank jungler right now....

replies.body:
{{champion:154}}  is probably one of the most fun champions to play, but not the "Best Tank Jungler", he does however make my top 5.

{{champion:79}}  is probably the one to beat for this accolade, the fat man has everything going for him in this regard.

{{champion:421}}  would also be right up there as would {{champion:2}} as both are commonly played in the pro leagues.

My favorite will always be {{champion:113}} , I hope they don't stuff  her up with the rebuild. 

And whatever happened to {{champion:33}} ? He hasn't been in the meta for quite some time, but was always good to watch in the pro leagues and part of the reason I became a spectator of esports. 

Others to consider would be {{champion:106}} , {{champion:3}} , {{champion:32}}  and as mentioned {{champion:20}} .

Good early game Damage, high mobility with his jump. What's not to like? Plus its very difficult to stop him getting into places you don't want him. Like into either pit for a steal, or your back line
You dont even have to go in the pit for a steal, you can cut across the back of it and smite mid-jump

I would say {{champion:154}}  currently is a very good pick 
Overall Generalist / Safe pick,Amazing Engage,Decent Damage,Never picked / Banned, Decent at carrying , Clears fast, with little cost
Also being able to build super tanky while still doing damage.  However down side is gameplay based around Elastic Slingshot and your decision making has to be on point.

{{champion:120}}   i concider to be up there becuse of his potential to chnage fights in a instant and his mobility.
he has Good early power,Very strong ganks,Fully AOE skills.High mobility and is fairly Easy to learn , his only real downside is he needs to farm as his builds can be costly and He is out dueled by the popular 1v1 junglers

{{champion:254}}  is a very good all rounder , A lot of cc,Tons of damage,Can be a tank or a good AD /tank hybridr, but Ulty can put you in a bad position,no healing,early ganks are all about hitting your Q , and takes a bit of learning.

there are a few more like {{champion:72}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:32}}{{champion:48}}   that all have there place but these top 3 i would say make it for the ''tank class ''
Where is "Rocka" when you need them?
except it's not zac, it's Daisy. Shortly followed up by the abominable Nunu.
